Item ID10284

The magic comp bow requires level 50 Ranged to equip. It is slightly quicker and more accurate than a magic longbow, and features the same special attack. Magic comp bows can be obtained as a reward for completing a hard Treasure Trail.

Composite bows can be fired from 10 squares away at both rapid and long range styles; this combination of speed and distance is matched only by the crystal bow and bow of faerdhinen. Where long attack distance is ideal, a magic comp bow could suffice as a non-degradable alternative to the crystal bow.

Combat styles[edit | edit source]

Bow
Combat OptionsCombat StyleStyle typeWeapon StyleExperienceInvisible Boost
AccurateRangedAccurateRanged and Hitpoints+3 Ranged
RapidRangedRapidRanged and Hitpoints+1 Attack speed
LongrangeRangedLongrangeRanged, Defence, and Hitpoints+3 Defence and +0 Attack range

Special attack[edit | edit source]

The magic comp bow's special attack, Powershot, is guaranteed to hit the target. This consumes 35% of the player's special attack energy. This special attack is also shared with the magic longbow.

Damage inflicted by this special attack is unaffected by damage-boosting prayers (such as Eagle Eye) and the slayer helmet (i).

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Reward casket (hard)N/A 11/270.8

The item was recoloured slightly.

[[File:Magic comp bow detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''magic comp bow''' requires level 50 [[Ranged]] to equip. It is slightly quicker and more accurate than a [[magic longbow]], and features the same [[special attack]]. Magic comp bows can be obtained as a reward for completing a hard [[Treasure Trail]].

Composite bows can be fired from 10 [[attack range|squares away]] at both rapid and long range styles; this combination of speed and distance is matched only by the [[crystal bow]] and [[bow of faerdhinen]]. Where long attack distance is ideal, a magic comp bow could suffice as a non-degradable alternative to the crystal bow.

==Combat styles==
{{CombatStyles|Bow|range = 10}}

==Special attack==
The magic comp bow's special attack, ''Powershot'', is [[Successful hit|guaranteed to hit]] the target. This consumes 35% of the player's special attack energy. This special attack is also shared with the [[magic longbow]].

Damage inflicted by this special attack is unaffected by damage-boosting [[prayer]]s (such as [[Eagle Eye]]) and the [[slayer helmet (i)]].
